name: Mountain Defense
description:
This game was made for the Wowie Jam 2.0!

Theme: Intentional Bugs

Guard yourself through the treacherous mountain pass, making sure to jump over the cracks.

Timeline will be posted soon, just have to edit it.

Controls are different then stated - up arrow to jump, that's the only control you need.
